data.title: Obituary for Matthew Jon "Mac" McDonough
data.meta_description:

data.text:
Mr. Matthew Jon “Mac” McDonough, 27, of Milford MA, died Saturday (December 10, 2016) in Worcester MA.

Mr. McDonough was born in Milford the son of the late Jon F. McDonough and the son of Tara (Usher) McDonough of Milford MA. He was a graduate of Milford High School, Class of 2007 and while attending Milford High School he was a three sport athlete. One of Matthew’s proudest moments was being a member of the 2006 Milford High School Super Bowl winning football team.

After attaining a degree in finance and business management from Bentley University in 2012 he had been employed at State Street Corporation.

Matthew is now in the arms of the person he loved most in life – his Dad. Along with his beloved mother, he is survived by his 2 Sisters: Ashley McDonough and her companion Kenneth Johnson of Worcester MA and Lauren McDonough of Milford MA; his Maternal Grandmother: Mary L. (Van Alstine) Usher of Mendon MA; 2 Nephews: Carter & Travis; also many aunts, uncles and cousins.

Matthew was the grandson of the late Frederick and the late E. Sylvia (Granholm) McDonough.

His funeral will be held Saturday (December 17th) at 9am from the Edwards Memorial Funeral Home, 44 Congress Street, Milford MA followed by a Mass of Christian Burial at 10am in St. Mary of the Assumption Church, 19 Winter Street, Milford MA. Burial will follow in Hopedale Village Cemetery. Visiting hours will be Friday (December 16th) from 4pm to 7pm.

In Matthew’s memory please be kind always. You never know what someone is going through. Memorial donations may be made to The Oliva Family Cancer Comfort Fund, c/o Milford Regional Healthcare Foundation, 14 Prospect Street, Milford MA 01757.

Goodbyes hurt the most when the story was not finished !!!!
